name: Tagliatelle with Tomatoes and Black Olives
ingredients: Parmesan cheese, to serve (sliced not grated)
instructions: Heat 30ml of the oil, add garlic and onion and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally
Add wine, sun dried tomatoes, and parsley
Cook for 2 minutes, stir in the olives, lower the heat and leave the sauce over a low heat
Preheat the grill, bring a large pan of salted water to the boil. Add teh tagliatelle and cook for 2-3 minutes
Put the tomatoes on a baking sheet and brush with the remaining oil. Grill for 3-4 minutes
When the pasta rises to the surface of the boiling water, drain it throughly, return it to the pan and toss with the sauce.
Pile into a bowl and add the grilled tomatoes. Grind black pepper over the top and add Parmesan shavings
